function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Spread of COVID-19 disease in healthcare sectors","Impact":"Overwhelmed healthcare systems, increased spread of the disease","Mitigation":"Implement strict infection control measures, increase healthcare capacity","Technologies":"Telehealth, remote monitoring, AI for disease prediction","People":"Healthcare workers, patients, public","Owner":"Healthcare organizations, government"},{"Description":"Challenges in implementing 5G technologies for healthcare","Impact":"Ineffective use of 5G for health-related use cases, potential privacy/security issues","Mitigation":"Robust testing and validation of 5G applications, privacy-aware design","Technologies":"5G, MEC, NS","People":"Healthcare technology developers, regulators","Owner":"Healthcare organizations, technology companies"},{"Description":"Re-emergence of COVID-19 due to relaxed control mechanisms","Impact":"New wave of infections, strain on healthcare systems","Mitigation":"Enhanced surveillance and monitoring, rapid response protocols","Technologies":"Contact tracing apps, rapid health service deployments","People":"Public, healthcare workers","Owner":"Government, public health agencies"}]}
